attributes.action: respect that the working class, british born and bred people deserve the governments attention
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is getting to the stage in Britain where everyone except the hard working British people are being treated well. It is about time that OUR great nation looks after its people instead of the people who are only here to live off all the freebies the government wants to give out. Its time to make Britain British again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
